subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are ready to lend some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$482,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://luvuiiksheap.com/
